org.pepstock.charba.client.positioner

Class JsPositionerHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.positioner.JsPositionerHelper

  • final class JsPositionerHelper
extends Object
    Internal utility of positioner to invoke java script methods to activate and manage custom positioner.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero

    • Method Detail

      • get

        static JsPositionerHelper get()
        Singleton object to get the helper instance
        Returns:
        helper instance.

      • register

        void register(IsTooltipPosition position,
              CallbackProxy.Proxy object)
        Register the tooltips positioner to CHART.JS.
        Parameters:
        position - new position for tooltips
        object - callback to invoke the tooltip positioner

      • unregister

        void unregister(IsTooltipPosition position)
        Unregister the tooltips positioner from CHART.JS.
        Parameters:
        position - position of tooltips to be removed

      • invoke

        Point invoke(IsTooltipPosition position,
             PositionerContext context,
             ArrayObject datasetItems,
             Point eventPoint)
        Invokes an existing positioner to get the point.
        Parameters:
        position - position of tooltips to be invoked
        context - context value of this to the execution context of function.
        datasetItems - list of dataset items
        eventPoint - point on the canvas where the event occurred.
        Returns:
        the point calculated by positioner or null if positioner does not exist
